TopicTitle: Accidental double-rightclick on a craft causes camera glitch

Articles.Content: Hello. If I accidentally double-right-click on a vessel (such as while hunting for the right part to right-click on), the camera gets stick in click-and-drag mode until I right-click away from the vessel. This happens in the VAB and during flight. This looks like a new glitch in v1.0.5.
Not a glitch but a new feature, as stated in 1.0.5 changelog.
Sadly, it's a rather distracting feature. Is there a way of turning this behavior off?

In the settings file for KSP it is the setting called 

CAMERA_DOUBLECLICK_MOUSELOOK = True

Just change it to FALSE and the feature will be turned off.

Cheers
